1.title: Pilot
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: John Maski is a man with a troubled past that he cant forget and day by day is coming back to haunt him, As a young boy he was ill-treated by his parents and it drove him to run away from home.Becoming a killer and using drugs the demons in his head is back to finish for good. John now in his 20's feels that he can't run away anymore but he knows no other way so he takes to the woods to confront his past by the shelter of firn and trees where he once felt safe as a young boy.
